Subject: Re: DeathScythe Awakens

From: Yanshosh@...

::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe holds up the device he had pulled out of his storage compartment. 
It was an energy disruptor, built for temporarily deactivating small energy 
fields. He looks at the wall in front of him. It would classify as a small 
field...

DeathScythe pushes a button on the device, a beam emerging from the tip of it 
and going into the energy field.

Several seconds later, DeathScythe was on the other side of the field, 
looking around the containment room. He smiles. This was too easy. 
Transforming back into beast mode, the still cloaked hideous creature runs 
off silently down a corridor.
